@KimCrayton1 yeah, we are memory. So is part of the process of how each is sensible to a information that we are exposing it self, as information, to be "attracked" to it. How communism did happen outside the first world country, where communism happen at the fist time? The same question for fascism. How a "old" event, happen again and again? You know...

The teacher try to guide choices, promoting the knowledege that lead the student to a good action. But if the teacher promote the symbols that did create events in reality ( good or bad ), then the condition to create what should be forgotten, have continuity.

The notion behind any religion is the same.
Religions events happen centuries ago, and by the condition of remembering, we celebrate centuries later.

Without memory, there is nothing, but care to share good memories, or else you will wake up the bad ones ;)

object.content:
Question-01: If some random person help a wild animal to survive, or a domestica animal to survive, or a human to survive, how much value that choice have?

Try to associate some number to it.

Remember that each choice, ask to each, You need to use your attention, you will need to think about what the other may need without knowing nothing about them. ( you will not get an answer from the wild animal or the domestic one, so easier, but you can easely find what they are looking for, or what they may need )

The answer may be in the feedback.

----

Question-02: Imagine that I setup an event in the world map, to clean a river.
If someone group with some "friends" or the company they work too, to clean that river, how much value that choice have?

Try to associate some number to it.

Remember that public services supposely do those action, while they are limit in the zone of their action.
If someone earn money to clean the garbage from any street, how much any other person should earn for their choice?

The answer may be "a moral choice", I cannot deny indeed, but does garbage services are doing some immorality?

----

Question-03: Imagine that the florest is burning. You can ignore that event or you can report that event to the authorities. How much value is in your choice?

Try to associate some number to it.

#participate

Here in this "small network" called #mastodon,

to break things.

If I wish to build,

I don't feel bad to know that my challenge is not the best site in the world,
without the best words in the world that lead you to a fascination state,
which make you to be addicted to the challenge needs,
but I cannot deny that I would feel better if that happen, indeed.

object.content:
Reflection about #security.

You remember how easy was to do anything in your computer before all updates and all upgrades?

Now you cannot, because is secure.

If nothing is 100% secure, why we keep going that way?

Oh yes, because we didn't learn the lesson, but repeat it to find the results.

Results are always the same.

1. System is too secure to be used by common users.
2. System did crash in sequence of one or more attacks.

Is curious how peaceful everyone else is, since they don't think about security.

Yes, because if you want to climb a building, you only need to feel secure on you, what that is the main key to success, all other tools are details that are important, but really, is not the system, is not the enviorement, is not all the users.

You see.. to break the system you need to be focusing that objective as the main #Fantasy since you need to use #logic to create that #event... In Time! :D

https://art.odicforcesounds.com/pages/Data/Audio/Spiritual_Algorithmic/tracks/02_Security_Functionality/index.html

I believe that Industry and Business companies should have a civic system behind their own.
But when I say, civic system I mean, based on explicit and concret actions...
I don't mean, invest to change your image or look without any action to create in others, the notions that some change was made.

Sadly Industry and Business are the systems who create more corruption and criminality. Is always based on "how much I will get in money", not

"how much I can help others to become better, based on moral and ethics values", since those values have no value at all.

Example: 20 Centuries ago and yesterday, man and woman help others to become better. They are in the group of "poor" people.

They spend their time to help others, and others just say "thank you", and many others spend their time to stole from you. Their group is the richers.

https://art.odicforcesounds.com/pages/Data/Audio/Emotional_Signals/tracks/11_Social_Tool_Kit/index.html

Those who help others are poor and those who rober are rich. We need to change the myth! ;)

object.content:
Here am I, in this network that works fine. Maybe I cannot spam my work to all companies in the world, but at least I am not blocked from use mastodon just because "You" want. I mean, all admins have that right, with or without an explanation, but those actions are made because someone did abuse within the security of the platform it self. Even then, there is a lot of people who are trying to break everything, the code and so on. Is some platforms they would considere to reward the one who break the platform if the breaker aims to make the #network platform, better. Glad some companies have that attitude to those who present their actions within the intention to make things better. I don't know about, "how it works", but if the breaker can fix the problem, we may need to considere to reward the breaker. If the breaker can only break but doesn't solve the problem, we may need to considere to arrest or punish the breaker. I like that aspect of using ethics to explore and test software in the security IT groups. With Kali linux we don't need need to compile our software. With those UIs, we don't even need to know what we are doing, because is by testing that we know what we are doing. Same for programming, same for exploring a application, same for learning a new language. Copy, paste, copy paste, is how we think we learn, but we deny we only repeat the ride. Oh now I understand... Do You? Because you did a lot of mistakes to reach that! When security persons aim to teach others, persons do less mistakes, when security persons aim to show how good they are, persons do more mistakes. Oh yes, even for living, most of us did learn by what other do, not by what others say we should or not do, since most denies, didn't have a logic explanation, which result in the need to explore what is refused to get more. The perspective of having the "bad" working for the health of "good" is not bad, if we educate the bad to be good. Is like teaching. We don't know if the student will follow our teachments, and we don't know if the student will become passionated to the subject we are teaching, but educational systems are the key to everything. The Students will grow with that knowledge in mine. In Time they will use that knowledge to create new things or to repeat the same things, but without it, not even evolution would be possible.
https://art.odicforcesounds.com/pages/Data/Audio/The_Long_Road/tracks/05_We_Must_Change_Our_Ways/index.html
#severncullissuzuki #Canada #ClimateChange #Tribute #America #Business #Asia #Economy #Africa #Freedom #Liberty #ukraine #Russia #Japan #China #USA #UK

I like this little detail of being "offensive" without being offensive directly to you.
You can attack something without being someone. Even if the attack target have someone's data, is not someone directly.
But even then, all IT attacks are not included in my Eternal License! ( they don't use physic violence to reach the objective )
Good or bad, objectives are like the world of fantasy. They can only be archived if you dream on it.

The #Infinite is defined by a constante. Life is not infinite, while #numbers are infinite, knowledge grows and vanish in Time.

Curiosities: any #blockchain system is generated by #computeres and they are full of random #data.

The Value of the most popular blockchains are big, while is only electricity. They have value because people see value on it. I don't deny it's value, but I remember all the problems we need to fix in reality in real time, that no computer can generate, and they have no value at all.

Nor economic #value or recognization of those fix...

So, my #Challenge is like that... only. I try to #educate the world to become better.

Are you going to #join me?

object.content:
how can I explain right? I like to explain! Sorry :D
for me Art is a tool. So we can expose our subjective emotions into something that is "real" but is not someone! So we can "save" others from our emotions.. while if they have a title, maybe those who listen, find the same emotion or similar, to the one I find listening those tracks.. You know.. some people say it right, is not what but how, and the how deals with sound, which is a pointer to the way someone deals with any information. And since society did develop a way to ignore emotions, since they part most of their own time of life, working for someone else dream to grow, you can use art ( music, pain, dance, whatever ) to "remove" those.. since we could create a object that represents that... Is like #science, when they formulate a object that represent the "core" information that can be used or at least "pointed" as a possibility, they leave the object to future use. Self therapy can be archived in several ways. This is my way, while if I mostly improvise, I don't feed the emotion for more time, which can be wise. How do you win the storm? If you try to win the storm you become the storm, so tell me, how do you win the storm? Well, I don't know about you, but I just ignore it and if is needed, I run away from it. Happy storm days for you too!
https://art.odicforcesounds.com/pages/Data/Audio/Machine_World/tracks/02_Pain_Art_illusion_and_Expression/index.html #experimental #electronic #music :D

object.content:
Just another controversion talk within myself and I.
-
We have this #Security problem that is a big problem, because we know that everything is insecure.
-
By reading about security, we find that permissions are the key problem and bad code design.
-
Is interesting because in society is the same, but the code we need to code is human not a machine.
-
Even without controlling the technique to guide humans, we are already facing the effects of humans controlling technology to "control" humans, which is not always to control humans but only data. Anyway, we are Data!
-
Question: which is the value of your Data? I mean, not even you can associate value to it, because for that, you would need in reality some application like the one I would like to create "with you all".
-
I am not sure if #Psychology is better this days because they can use technology, but in the perspective of mathematical thinking can be good to research for results, while in the perspective of humanization, can be terrible and destructive.
-
#Science dear science.
The event happen, you can explain it. Now what? Let us test another thing and forget everything? I mean, even to start researching is good to clean the cache, which is the core of everything we know as humans:
-
Memories.

any thinking being can get lost in reality or in the subjectivity that it represents. The thinking being can express himself and by doing so, he will be able to find reflections of his words, which will be recreated in each thinking being, who will be able to question the expression of the other thinking being. Expression is not creation nor can it change reality. It only serves as a pointer to a possibility, which by order of nature is not absolute, but perhaps only a fragment that complements the others. This is the function of communication and the function of transformation of discovering everything that could exist beyond the verb, but which can only be described using the verb. This is the need for documentation that starts from observation. Only such documentation may be relevant to others. The rest is life. Brains that appreciate life.
----
Question: What are you paying attention to?

object.content:
#Peru #Brasil #Indigenas #Venezuela #Chile #Cuba #Africa #etc...
Existem aspectos que o conteúdo judicial, abraçou como ferramenta de manipulação, há mais de 20 séculos atrás. Talvez um pouco antes da pólvora ser inventada. Desde então, milhares de pessoas no mundo, apaixonaram-se por objectos que servem o propósito da penetração de outros corpos sem a sua permissão, para que dessa forma pudessem reinar. Infelizmente, a paixão foi de tal ordem profunda, que os pequenos objectos transformaram-se em objectos monstruosamente grandes, capazes de penetrar vários milheres de corpos num só instante. Diga-se de forma formal, que estes objectos parecem falos, e sendo que são projectados, talvez sejam tentativas de criar novos filhos, sendo que na verdade a única função que esses objectos têm, é a de destruir.
---
A justiça teria uma função de continuidade da educação, mas não, a justiça como função puramente documental e juridica, pode ser útil, mas quanto à abordagem da necessidade de "fazer justiça" é que deverá haver mudanças profundas, quanto à forma como os soldados, agentes e restantes membros das sociedades que "estão predispostos a defender os seus" ( e não os negócios ), devem ter com o resto da população. A primeira regra deveria ser: Não usar armas, pois só "os não soldados é que poderiam precisar de uma, pois não sabem lutar".
A segunda regra seria: aprender a educar de forma não violenta. ( de certo que a educação pode estudar este tipo de questões psíquicas do comportamento humano, para que seja possível melhorar o conteúdo informativo e instrumental de todos os "agentes judiciais" que sentem necessidade de fazer justiça por si próprios, pois estão a cumprir essa função, sendo que a mesma só pode ter resolução oficial, no tribunal. Os tribunais também têm problemas. Tudo tem problemas!
-
Os governos são um pouco menos corruptos do que a industria, mas existe algum em comum com todos os sistemas, legais ou ilegais: Dinheiro. O objecto que oferece a função da liberdade de escolha de acção. "Expressões numéricas que represetam valor" ...

-

Antes e durante o processo escolar, existe uma tentativa de guiar os alunos a terem boas escolhas. Mesmo havendo esse sistema, eventos imprevistos acontecem. Se o sistema judicial se desliga dos princípios educativos, só poderemos ter corrupção em todos os sentidos judiciais.. isto é, sociais. ( sem economia incluída )... sendo que a economia é o factor principal das acções de corrupção do outro cidadão. Depois temos necessidades de elevação e opressão por "prazer" e sabe-se lá que mais :) .. sempre em prol do dinheiro, não propriamente em prol de algo "maior".
-
Por isso digo e volto a dizer: " Se o tempo está escrito na nossa memória, então a expressão do tempo é a expressão da nossa memória, como função do tempo!" .. Estão todos incluíd@s na minha licença eterna! odicforcesounds.com

A primeira regra deveria ser: Não usar armas, pois só "os não soldados é que poderiam precisar de uma, pois não sabem lutar".
A segunda regra seria: aprender a educar de forma não violenta. ( de certo que a educação pode estudar este tipo de questões psíquicas do comportamento humano, para que seja possível melhorar o conteúdo informativo e instrumental de todos os "agentes judiciais" que sentem necessidade de fazer justiça por si próprios, pois estão a cumprir essa função, sendo que a mesma só pode ter resolução oficial, no tribunal. Os tribunais também têm problemas. Tudo tem problemas!
-
Os governos são um pouco menos corruptos do que a industria, mas existe algum em comum com todos os sistemas, legais ou ilegais: Dinheiro. O objecto que oferece a função da liberdade de escolha de acção. "Expressões numéricas que represetam valor" ...

-

Antes e durante o processo escolar, existe uma tentativa de guiar os alunos a terem boas escolhas. Mesmo havendo esse sistema, eventos imprevistos acontecem. Se o sistema judicial se desliga dos princípios educativos, só poderemos ter corrupção em todos os sentidos judiciais.. isto é, sociais. ( sem economia incluída )... sendo que a economia é o factor principal das acções de corrupção do outro cidadão. Depois temos necessidades de elevação e opressão por "prazer" e sabe-se lá que mais :) .. sempre em prol do dinheiro, não propriamente em prol de algo "maior".
-
Por isso digo e volto a dizer: " Se o tempo está escrito na nossa memória, então a expressão do tempo é a expressão da nossa memória, como função do tempo!" .. Estão todos incluíd@s na minha licença eterna! odicforcesounds.com

object.content:
#Portugal #Incendios
Não entendo o que os soldados e os militares estão a fazer.
A função militar seria a de colaborar a cuidar do território nacional.
Se todos os militares de todos os países do mundo, deixassem as armas de lado e fossem limpar as matas e fazer o controlo educacional das boas práticas de como fazer fogueiras, ou até para monitorizar qualquer tentativa de queimar por prazer ou dinheiro, nada disso aconteceria. É pena que a maioria dos militares se tenha apaixonado pelas armas, pois a sua função deveria estar na prevenção de qualquer perigo para a população, mas com armas na mão, tudo isso é em vão, pois nem todo o soldado sabe se auto dominar a sua emoção, que lhe oferece a tentação de reinar e manipular a realidade.
-
Eu cá imagino: na recruta são pelo menos dois meses com exercícios duros. Com organização e método, todos os soldados teriam a capacidade de prevenir este tipo de práticas bem comuns nas sociedades, pois sabemos que até o pinheiro ou o eucapílto, não iriam arder mesmo que nascessem no meio de Deserto, mas sim se um raio lhes cair em cima. O resto é tudo posto é tudo feito. É resultado da despreocupação do vosso papel de monitorização que não necessita de armas.
-
#telesur Amo o vosso canal! Alguns problemas de "som" mas tudo bem.

When reading about totalism, I ask myself: from who? Russia? China? USA? ... etc...
Totalitarian system is something we are living for long time. If is not a king, is a government.
They all do the same.. they all have the same propose.. which is, to control.
Some can be healthy, some are not. Most of them are not.
---
The point I want to put in the game is:
In the name of Money, being totalitary or just a simple business, people do really evil things.
Is a Historical fact. It doesn't matter if you are american, chinese or ET.. ( maybe ETs don't use Money, then they will not do evil things for money )
---
Point is: motivate choices ( world wide ), being totalitarian or not, being anarchist or not.. naturally fascism don't care about it, so I don't care about them too.
The problem in society is in persons choices. Then we try to create a solution that may help others in that little problem of Life.
in my challenge I describe that we need email. Now we have QRcodes. No Email, no name, no phone, just a code. (i like it)
---
If you believe that humanistic actions and civism system, should be inside economy, mainly industry, then you don't understand the problem.
Whhat is the next territory that will be exploited to extract the goodies ? I don't know, but I know that will happen in the name of Money.. for example in Brasil.. already happen for many years.
They are not the only ones... but they are one of the examples.

for interest we already have wars! ( who cares who will win.. ( if not everyone who participate ) ) .. is just for money, so morals and ethics are irrelevant.

object.content:
#FederaçãoAnarquista #Kropotkin .. parece-me ( intuitivamente ) que uma nova "fobia" está em crescimento.
Na verdade, creio que não é mais do que uma "fobia" com base no populismo, mas toda ela desenvolve-se da mesma maneira.
Se o autor é Russo, então a maioria diz que "não". Além da "fobia" baseada na religião. Ou a "fobia" baseada com principios culturais.
---
Curiosidades da história:

Era uma vez um país que teve alguns séculos de conflito para conseguir um território só para si, onde as suas características culturais, não chocam com outras que não são iguais.
Passado tanto tempo de luta e sacrifício, estamos agora a anunciar ao mundo que tais territórios são de facto, de todo o mundo e por ordem lógica da situação, cá estamos nós a viver uma grande confusão.
Países externos dominam os internos e os internos desligam-se da necessidade de dominar, pois já há quem o faça sempre que pode, divulgar.
-
Nota: Se o Português não está predisposto a mudar as suas raízes culturais, quando está dentro de outro país, o que irá acontecer é óbvio.
Ele irá corrumper os valores culturais do outro país, introduzindo os seus e no processo, adquire valores culturais da cultura em que está inserido.
A mim parece-me positivo, mas se lembrarmos a história, o melhore seria, ter esquecido, não-compreendido.

Once upon a Time, there was a group of people who were living in peace, and some external person did break their peace.
There problem is here, not in the system. I don't really like MSWindows, but I did like something that Bill Gates said.
"We don't need a secure system but a functional system. Naturally, if you could spot the problem is because you did configure a functional system, else it would be impossible to spot the problem.
---
For me, this represent some moral and ethics problem, Plus: the "big" continue to exploit the "little" while that is what we call criminal.
it looks like in the world of technology there is this topic called security that have two sides. The defensive and the offensive.

... The American people can tell me I am wrong on that aspect, but please, if you are american, you know about the gun problem.
The random mass murders happen because someone have access to those tools that everyone knows that can only be used to kill or destroy. There is no other utility on those.
Even then, they are freely given. So the moral and ethic problem I wish to open in here is:
if we already know the result of the effect of using those tools, and the condition that create those events in reality and "we" do nothing, then who ever use those tools cannot be criminalized, because the "guilty" is firstly the ones who share those tools, not the ones who did use them. Above the self...

Na verdade a criança não é vitima de racismo mas de perfeccionismo. Eis uma problemática tramada, pois o perfeccionista irá sentir-se de tal modo desconfortável com o erro dos outros que transforma-se e fica agressivo ou violento. Assim era o tratamento de vários alunos de um professor de música que não sabia auto-dominar as suas emoções enquanto profissional. Uma problemática milenar, pois sabe-se que ainda no séculos passado e também no actual, milhares de crianças ou até adultos, são vitimas de violencia por causa de aspectos simples e ridiculos que só podem ser corrigidos via o treino e não via a técnica violenta e agressiva que muitos foram vitimas. Esse problema pode ser detectado me vários pontos e grupos da actualidade, onde o "deitar abaixo" o próximo é a técnica que garante algum tipo de resultado positivo. É assim considerado por causa dos efeitos imediatos, mas pondo de lado os efeitos colaterais. O pior dos efeitos colaterais é que a vitima poderá um dia mais tarde, fazer o mesmo a outra pessoa, acreditando que está a fazer a melhor escolha, pois foi essa que usaram para ela. Assim se dá continuidade a aspectos comportamentais que deveriam ser corrigidos e que nada tem a ver com racismo, mesmo que tal atitude, seja altamenta discriminatória e que por consequencia da falta de auto-domínio, insulta a vítima como primeiro passo para rebaixa-la.

That can lead you to internal #conflicts, which is not #good. For that, sometimes I #feel sorry about my #style, but I cannot deny the beauty of #nature, while you don't deny it as well, since you like #cats and #flowers. I am just a #Monkey, not #king, not #god, just a animal that can live in peace within #humans. We can see that we can #educate Tigers and #Lions to be #peaceful and #friendy with humans and other "oponents" in their #natural state of #life. So, when I know that we know, I put in cause, everything that doesn't go into that direction, that we know that have good #results in all transformation process that we " #cook " in reality and #humanity history and our " #dream ". The #Qigong theory speak about the #Tiger the #Bear the #Bird and the #Monkey. Even if I still believe that everyone can be good, here we are again, representing #Time to you. You are the #emperor, and you need to Dream, because is the only way for you, to be free. -

-

-

object.content:
I like the notion of #blueteams and I just don't like so much the #redteam, because they can have the "need", to use the same technique outside the space they should focus their knowledge, which is to make sure that the blueteam configurations are resistent to the redteam attacks.
--
In the perspective of IT security, I think industry are organizing this "groups" to work together, which is good.
In the perspective of Human security, I think industry don't care so much, but teams should do the same, meanings, they should work together, and not ones against others. You should do that in your lab with your friends that are hackers like you.
--
For me, security concern me, because by the flow of technology, any one can hack, even without knowing how to hack without using a external application, which means, we banalize it and that have a price. The same for human reality. That is why some contries around the world are so unsafe. Naturally is not only that, but mainly that. If military know how to fight, they don't need guns to fight. Curiosly we see this days miltary "playing games", so we can imagine that "any" children could do the same or better, without any military education, which should be only a guide as knowledge that give information about how to survive and self discipline. Nothing more.

object.content:
Fico sem saber o que dizer: Rock é Rock. Heavy Metal é Heavy Metal. Nunca deveria haver uma associação da RELIGIÃO com a música. Música Cristã é música de CORO, de PIANO e nada mais. Desculpem mas fico mesmo triste com este tipo de manipulação dos valores. Até parece que existe música coral satânica ou anti-cristã, para considerarem declarar-se como um estilo de música religioso. A Religião ( seja ela qual for ), tem exercícios musicais para "facilitar" a conecção entre o crente e Deus e isso não pede mais do que a voz do crente, sem melodia, sem palavras de ordem, sem uma vontade que se auto-declara original. Deixem de copiar os "maus" para se mostrarem "bons" .. a música é música.. ela é espiritual porque toda a música é capaz de transmitir emoções sem o uso do VERBO e sem VERBO não há factualidade de nada.. nem das subjectividades do ser. Dizer que a música não tradicional "como produto original", é estragar e desrespeitar a unicidade da música. É como o "Black Metal". Todas as bandas que se associaram ao satanismo ou às políticas extremistas, dentro de um estilo sonoro que serve antes de tudo, a descrição das más sensações que todos temos de lidar, é manipulação a total desrespeito pela música. A música é Música.. náo é política, náo é religião.. é simplesmente vibração.
-

contentMap.en:
Fico sem saber o que dizer: Rock é Rock. Heavy Metal é Heavy Metal. Nunca deveria haver uma associação da RELIGIÃO com a música. Música Cristã é música de CORO, de PIANO e nada mais. Desculpem mas fico mesmo triste com este tipo de manipulação dos valores. Até parece que existe música coral satânica ou anti-cristã, para considerarem declarar-se como um estilo de música religioso. A Religião ( seja ela qual for ), tem exercícios musicais para "facilitar" a conecção entre o crente e Deus e isso não pede mais do que a voz do crente, sem melodia, sem palavras de ordem, sem uma vontade que se auto-declara original. Deixem de copiar os "maus" para se mostrarem "bons" .. a música é música.. ela é espiritual porque toda a música é capaz de transmitir emoções sem o uso do VERBO e sem VERBO não há factualidade de nada.. nem das subjectividades do ser. Dizer que a música não tradicional "como produto original", é estragar e desrespeitar a unicidade da música. É como o "Black Metal". Todas as bandas que se associaram ao satanismo ou às políticas extremistas, dentro de um estilo sonoro que serve antes de tudo, a descrição das más sensações que todos temos de lidar, é manipulação a total desrespeito pela música. A música é Música.. náo é política, náo é religião.. é simplesmente vibração.

object.content:
maybe my comparative examples are not the #best, but I find them very connected to the rest...
In the #Oriental interpretation, #Yin is mainly associated to #Woman and #Yang is associated to #Men.
All men can be female and all woman can be male, in the perspective of their own attitude in relation of their connections.
---
I don't know about you, but my mother was super cute with me, when I did everything she ask to, but she become a monster when I deny.
The "right hand" is no able to be so feminine, since the majority are man, and the "left hand" needs to be more masculine, since the majority are woman.
---
Is interesting to see that in reality, but the point is not who you are, but how you behave and what values are in the root of your beliefs.
-
Woman are #symbol of #Freedom and #Justice, even if only this last centuries, we start giving the diserved freedom to woman, since before, they were only a symbol that couldn't live like the symbology "printed by us, to be".
-
Freedom can only be archived when we are #secure, and justice can only happen when #education is the #root.
-
This last #key is where the main flaw lives. Justice #system needs to give continuity to educational #principles, instead of assuming that humans should do what "we" believe that is good "for you", without giving any explanation, like #robots, #machines and #computers do.
-
In some interpretations, Yin is the #negative part of life, because it is only thinking about the self, no body else.
In some interpretations, Yang is the #positive part of #Life, because it is always thinking about the other self estability, not the #self as the #center of the #world.
-
#Welcome to the Era of #Fire ( Yin ), where the #Monkey is the expression of Yang.. so try to have #fun!
-

object.content:
Siempre que veo el presidente de #Venezuela hablando, me surge algunas dudas. Hay siempre algo de positivo en todo y algo de negativo.
-
El punto clave és motivar a que los aspectos negativos no tengan más valor que los positivos, mismo que las noticias describan que los aspectos negativos son más recordados que los positivos, siendo que #Hugochaves tiene un discurso positivo.
-
La #industria y la #economia son los puntos principales, em que foco mi intención de crear el cambio necessário para todos los otros, pues la política "baila de alegria" por la economia y el trabajador, "baila de alegria" cuando la industria reconoce su valor. El #dinero nunca será la clave de la #salvación pero puede ser útil nesse processo de transformación, pues como sabemos, los #pobres casi no piden dinero y los #ricos, no saben hacer nada más que eso. #Telesur
-
Espero que el Inglês no sea un impedimiento, pero caso sea, me avisen que ire hacer una página para que vosotros puedan leer.
... Perdon, pero no soy Rei de la #savana no ire obligarvos a cambiar de atitude via la fuerza.. por eso, pueden ignorarme y decir:

"que gracia, és solo un mono"
--
No hay problema que me llamen de mono.. prefiero ser mono que fiera.

object.content:
Por vezes fico "triste" só por pensar que pessoas que seguem advocacia, nem sempre querem mudar a lei em prol da sua função judicial mas em função dos interesses comerciais.
É triste porque a lei, deveria ter como intenção principal, a justiça social e não económica. Já que é o "orgão" social que será "explorado" pelo comercial, o orgão comercial, deveria saber-se comportar, perante a sua condição, que lhe permite realizar o que está a sonhar. Os governos deveriam aplicar mais obrigações baseadas em acções em vez de obrigações puramente económicas.
"O rico quase não sente e o pobre não mente (estão a roubar-me)" ... isso de definirem um valor fixo é absurdo, pois até os valores das multas, deveriam ser consideradas a partir do estilo económico que a pessoa tem. ... São aqueles principios educativos e judiciais que todas as culturas deveriam saber ser e ter para elas próprias, como orgânica funcional e comunitária.
---
Talvez a industria, via a sua capacidade de transformação da realidade via a condição económica, sinta necessidades de ser "injusta", pois os governos não pensaram nas comunidades, antes de aceitarem os negócios industriais, sendo que deveria ser obrigatório que seja partido A ou B, tivessem essa função como obrigação soció-política, que deixaria de ser somente representativa.
---
E se estiver errado, sigam para outro lado! :D

object.content:
In the perspective of security, I ear about using Docker to run applications that can use X.
I just don't understand how to run them. Anyone here knows a good resource to read about it, with some example?
I am using #firejail to isolate applications but even then, I wish to know how to run them inside a docker.
I think I will use a bit more resources, but maybe it will give me a better sense of security, while is true that the main SO needs to be secure too.
Hardening is crazy, because if you get paranoid, you can break your system funcionality and lock it down.
We can see that sometimes, those super secure systems can be breaked since the flaw is not in the system but in some service or application they are using.
In that perspective I like #Gentoo Linux because they give you "more freedom" to personalize what features you wish to use for each application or in global variables.
Configuring and maintaining Gentoo is MAD, but a good place to start understanding the differences between Operating systems and their features.
#Debian still is one of the best to use and configure, while all features are active by default, wish can lead to some problems.
For example, #keepasscx that is used to manage our passwords, have a remote-access feature that is active by default. Be sure you inactivate it, or use some #jail technology to remove network access.
...
I like this experiences of configuring my systems, but I do it for fun, since I have no certification that prove that I know something in a technical way, so ignore me :D

@Yehuda ... hi, I like #turtles, be they #indigeous #jewish or #free from any category.
I am reading your site, and I like it! Decolonization is not a metaphor, but a process.
Colonization was an event that happen in the name of growing content to industry.
First centuries they target #gold and this day's we can use this kind of technology for free to express our self's into reality.
Even if we don't like to think, we can do it, because they did build this world, where most of us can be free of choice because we have money.
The point I target in this little dream of mine, is to try to educate the industry, that is the group who can break all the rules to gain more ( money )
Here we can be Humans or Monkeys.. what ever we feel like.. without any restriction.. so free your mind!
Cleaning my memories from all the violence I was victim is not a metaphor, but a process that depends on my will.
For everything in this life, we have at least two more perspectives... The behavior of history was bad, but as we can see, everything aims to repeat.
Maybe the educational system run away from everyone, assuming that everyone could be "good" with the education they get from school. No.. not the case. Sadly!
Is not always what we believe that is good, but the technique we use to archive it. Is like my example..
As a Monkey I enjoy to potencial of my own mind, but not all "animals" are like me, for example you don't run or jump, while I love to jump from tree to tree.
Is like to jump from subject to subject for fun, as a technique to archive some gold... first we talk about society then we talk about psychology, then we jump to technology and we jump again to history, to explain the way we feel the #rain. The rain continue to fall and what ever is our feelings about it, we should remember that the rain is only water that somewhere in Time was water from the grown...
Go up and down .. up and down.. it can remember many others things, that go up and down.. even economy.. There is good things that we can enjoy this days that were built based on what we call colonization.. most countries that had no justice system, now they have... beside a tribal way to archive everything... even with all the bad things that happen, indigenous can call justice systems to defend them self's.. and have a big system that can help them on that.. but remember.. those systems are colonial.. and even if there is a lot of bad memories, we now have good features.
-
Is like to care health. We need to do a lot of sacrifices to survive.. we block our desires.. we deny our needs.. only to be good in this non-eternal misery full of creativity.
Is good to remmeber that all "bla bla bla" can inspire us, but we really need a practical system that lead us to become better in Time, because that is the big lesson of Time, or else, we will repeat the same..
Without Gold and the Industrial revolution, we couldn't talk or exchange our point of views from here.. You know..is just a dream about a monkey who thing he is king.
Kings were not always fair, but few... https://art.odicforcesounds.com/pages/OscarFM/index.html
